words.fact: The Scrum Master facilitates the Scrum process, removes impediments, and ensures the team follows Agile practices. They serve the team, not manage it.
The Product Owner maximizes product value by managing the backlog, prioritizing features, and representing stakeholder needs to the development team.
Developers are cross-functional team members who build the product increment. In Scrum, everyone who creates the product is called a Developer.
Stakeholders are people outside the Scrum Team who have an interest in the product, such as customers, users, executives, and sponsors.
